title: Define Project Scope and Requirements (Updated)
description: This task involves a comprehensive requirements gathering for the CognitiveWorkloadOptimizer system. The deliverables include user stories, use cases, functional and non-functional requirements, system architecture, data flow diagrams, technology stack recommendations, potential integration points with existing systems, a plan for user testing and feedback collection, as well as documentation for all these components. A focus is given to the role of AI/ML models in managing cognitive load and optimizing productivity. The goal is to create clear, concise, and easy-to-understand documentation. Please note that while the task is currently IN_PROGRESS, it would be beneficial to establish timelines and milestones for completion.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the system, including components, data flow, and integration points.

title: Develop Cognitive Load Monitoring Module
description: Implement the module responsible for monitoring and analyzing cognitive load data from various sources.

title: Develop Work Environment Adjustment Module
description: Implement the module responsible for adjusting work environments based on cognitive load data.

title: Design and Implement User Interface
description: Design and develop the user interface for the system, including dashboards and configuration interfaces.

title: Set up Data Storage and Management
description: Design and implement the data storage and management solution for the system, including databases and data pipelines.

title: Implement Security and Access Control
description: Design and implement security measures and access control mechanisms for the system.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Establish a CI/CD pipeline for the project, including automated testing, building, and deployment processes.

title: Develop Test Suite and Quality Assurance Plan
description: Create a comprehensive test suite and quality assurance plan for the system, including unit tests, integration tests, and acceptance tests.

title: Write Technical Documentation
description: Develop technical documentation for the system, including architecture diagrams, API documentation, and user guides.
